SRP.Q: Is Higher Education positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Digital Literacy?
SRP.A: Higher Education is positioned {inside} Digital Literacy.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Community Learning, Higher Education, or Postgraduate?

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Formal Education to Secondary Education to Vocational Schools to Technical Training}.
